name: PHP Scripts -> Advertisement / Internet
summary: Start your own Url Rotator Service
description:
URL rotation can be one of the most useful tools for a webmaster.
If you have multiple products or affiliate programs to promote with not enough time to promote them all, the rotator can be your best friend.
This will allow you to add as many URL's as you wish to the rotation and is fully maintained through an easy to use admin panel, which gives you full control over the settings.
